Name: Hemingway Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A fresh and refreshing orange and vanilla influenced Vodkatini.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Claire Smith, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Hemingway Martini contains 193 calories
